query.sql:
-- [params]
-- boolean :enable_null_category = false

WITH post AS (SELECT
    id AS post_id,
    topic_id,
    EXTRACT(YEAR FROM created_at) AS year
FROM posts
WHERE post_type = 1
    AND deleted_at ISNULL
    AND post_number != 1)

SELECT
    p.year,
    t.category_id AS id,
    c.name category,
    COUNT(p.post_id) AS qt
FROM post p
INNER JOIN topics t ON t.id = p.topic_id
LEFT JOIN categories c ON c.id = t.category_id
WHERE t.deleted_at ISNULL
    AND (:enable_null_category = true OR t.category_id NOTNULL)
GROUP BY t.category_id, c.name, p.year
ORDER BY p.year DESC, qt DESC
query.name: Number of replies by category
query.description: List the number of replies by category.
